description:
CEWE - Photobooks, Photo Printing & More

Discover the CEWE app and create photo books, greeting cards, wall art, posters, calendars and other photo gifts in just a few minutes, tailored to your exact wishes.

From your phone to your heart – with attention to detail.

A beautiful photo book layout created as if by magic and perfected by you! Clever features help you achieve a professional photo book result in no time. Your photo book will always be breathtaking and perfectly arranged – even without prior experience!

Join millions of satisfied customers! 

OUR HIGHLIGHTS

• Smart photo selection: Get automatic suggestions for the best photos for your photo book and perfectly showcase your most beautiful moments!

• Automatic book suggestions: Need inspiration for your design? Our app automatically generates personalised photobook suggestions from your best pictures – completely free of charge.

• Smarter layout: Thanks to intelligent image distribution, your photos are optimally and harmoniously arranged on the photobook pages. The app ensures a balanced layout and a professional result, effortlessly!

• Start in the app, finish in the software: Create your CEWE PHOTOBOOK projects flexibly and take advantage of the expanded creative possibilities on your PC or laptop. Save projects in CEWE myPhotos and continue working on them in the CEWE software.

• Intuitive editor: A new, streamlined design and exciting assistant functions help with the design process.

• Data privacy: Your data and photos are securely stored and are not shared with third parties.

Download the CEWE app for free and order your photo products quickly and easily.

OUR CEWE PRODUCTS AT A GLANCE

• CEWE PHOTOBOOK
• Photo prints & instant photos
• Wall art, canvas prints & posters
• Mugs, puzzles, photo magnets, cushions, and much more
• Greeting & Postcards
• Phone Cases
• Photo Calendars

CEWE PHOTOBOOK
• Sizes: Create in 8 photo book formats
• Covers: Softcover/Hardcover
• Paper Types: Digital printing and photo paper in matte, premium matte, or glossy
• Number of Pages: Photo paper (26-130 pages) or digital printing (26-202 pages)
• Book cover finishing with raised effect varnish, gold, rose gold, or silver embellishment

GREETING & POSTCARDS
• Send holiday greetings: Design real postcards with your own photos and send them directly!
• Designs for every occasion: Wedding, christening, birth, birthday, and much more
• Greeting cards, congratulations cards, invitations and thank-you notes, save-the-date cards

PHOTOS & PHOTO PRINTING
• Photo prints in 9x, 10x, 11x, and 13x formats
• Instant photos for contactless printing at the CEWE Photo Station

WALL ART, CANVAS & POSTERS
• The right material for your format: photo canvas, rigid foam board, aluminium Dibond, or acrylic glass
• Poster printing: glossy, matte, pearlescent, silk screen, fine art matte

PHOTO GIFTS: MUGS, PUZZLES, MAGNETS
• Photo gifts with great designs
• Photo mugs: from magic mugs to enamel mugs
• Puzzles with 112, 266, 500, and 1000 pieces
• Photo magnets, keychains, and photo pillows

PHOTO CALENDARS
• Wall calendars and desk calendars for 2025
• Many creative designs
• Calendar pages with Customise your colour

PHONE CASES
• Automatic phone model detection (changeable at any time)
• For the latest iPhones, Huawei, Xiaomi, and Samsung smartphones, as well as all other major manufacturers

SUPPORT
If you have any questions about the CEWE App & photo products, please contact our customer service team
By e-mail: info@cewe.co.uk
By phone: 01926 463 107
Mon - Sun from 8am - 10pm
